item.name: ✅Get All cars NO NEED AUTH - valid
✅Get car by id NO NEED AUTH- valid
❌Update car - no permission for this role
❌Update car - brand and model already exist
❌Delete car by id - no permission for this role
❌SET Inventory car - no permission for this role
❌Register new user -  password do not match
❌Update user role - no permission for this role
❌Update user profile - Email already in use
❌Update user profile -  user data is blank
❌Change password - do not match new password
❌Add rental MANAGER - no permission for this role
❌Add rental CUSTOMER- return date less then rental date
❌Add rental CUSTOMER- exceeding min rental period
❌Add rental CUSTOMER- exceeding max rental period
❌Add rental CUSTOMER- no cars available for rent
✅Get rentals (invalid userId) CUSTOMER - valid (ignoring param userId)
❌Get rentals MANAGER - ignoring invalid name parameter
❌Get rental by id - not exist rental id
❌Get rental by id CUSTOMER - alien rental id
❌Return rental by id - not exist rental id
❌Return rental by id CUSTOMER - alien rental id
❌Return rental by id - rental already returned
✅Add payment that has expired status - valid
✅Add payment  - get url for already PENDING status
❌Add payment - no permission for this role MANAGER
❌Add payment  - no FINE(rental not returned, term expired)
✅Renew expired payment  - get url for already PENDING status
❌Renew payment - no permission for this role MANAGER
✅Get all payments Customer- valid (ignorin user_id param)
✅Get all payments Manager- valid with user_id
✅Get all payments Manager- valid without user_id
❌Get all payments Manager- negative user id
❌Get all payments Manager- not existing user id
